text: ratak diyunu wimata nam diyunu danumen sannaddha purawasiyan eratehi sitiya yuthuyi.

obata mata pawasimata aththe idiriya balagena thith yakala nohakiyi.

kattiya kiwwe widyagnyayo set eka honde.ohoma inna kota inna kota onna eka wandurek shep eke yanawa inimaga paththata.mu gihilla palaweni padiya alluwa witharayi ape balagena hitapu widyagnyayo tika gahuwa neda sithala wathura.ane ara naginda giya ekata nemeyi, mokuthma nokara hitapu anith un tikata.hama sarema ekek inimagata nagina kotama anith unta gahanawa sithala wathura.

jyethishawedin warthamanayedi ' thama kiyu anawakiyak waradi nathi " bawa pawasayi.namuth waraduna than kothekuth atha.warthamanaye siyalla mudal matha thiranayawe.janamadhya bhawitha kirima magin pudgalika pawathma udesa thama hakiyawan uluppa dakwimak sidu karayi.eya misa wena kisiwak nowe.sannasgala oba madhyawediyekudayi ma nodanimi.namuth janasanniwedana wishaye madhyabhawithaya saha ehi upakrama pilibadawa wenama parichchedayak lesa uganwanu labayi.ee anuwa madhya thula jyethishaye hasirawima therum ganimata obata hakiyawa thibiya yuthuya.oba madhyata udin pathwu ayeki.madhya bhawithaye mulika siddhantha oba dana sitinne keseda ?

dharanipatha warusawa hethuwen awathanwa sitina janathawata sahana salasima sandaha rupiyal miliyana 80k wen kara athayi aapada kalamanakarana amathi ee. ech. em. fawusi mahatha dinaminata pawasiya.me wana wita miliyana 21ka mudalak awathan wuwan ge sahana katayuthu sandaha waya kara athi bawada pawasu amathiwaraya siyaluma mudal pradeshiya lekamwaru haraha labadimata katayuthu karana bawada amathiwaraya kiya.miyagiya sandaha labadena mudal aadhara owunge langama gnyathiyakuta labadimata piyawaragena athi bawath amathiwaraya pawasiya.idiriye di awathan wana sesu janathawa wenuwen da janadhipathithumage upades anuwa aapada sahana salasime aramunin thawaduratath mudal aadhara labadimata katayuthu karana bawada amathiwaraya awadharanaya kele ya.
